summary: the virus is an enveloped, single-stranded, positive-sense RNA virus. it causes diarrhea in swine of all ages, with high mortality in piglets. in recent years, acute outbreaks of epizootic diarrhea occurred in most of the provinces in china. the gene contains 231 nt (nt 25449 to 25679), the M gene consists of 681 nt (nt 25687 to 26368), the N gene consists of 1,326 nt (nt 26379 to 27704) and the 3′ UTR is 334 nt (nt 27705 to 28038) in length. both the S gene and the ORF3 gene have high levels of genetic diversity. genome sequence of PEDV strain ZJCZ4 deposited in GenBank under accession number JX524137.
